channel.title: Npc Drop Problem
channel.description: I know coding npc drops are pretty easy however i am having trouble with this file as it is more confusing than any other one ive had look for yourself [img]http://img265.imageshack.us/img265/1986/helpm.png[/img]

item.title: Npc Drop Problem
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

It picks one random item from the array. If you want the npc to drop more items you have to make another entry.
Like so:

npcdrop = 125 941 4067 1
npcdrop = 125 941 995 5000000

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Drop Problem
item.dc:creator: @ServerCr4eat3r ServerCr4eat3r
item.description:
@ServerCr4eat3r wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:4, topic:382034”]Looks easy enough, though I have no idea what dropType does.
After npcdrop =, the first value is the npc id, the second is the drop type. Followed by an array that takes 2 entries: itemID and the amount.[/quote] yes however i did this to a green dragon and i posted this…

npcdrop = 125 941 995 5000000 4067 5000000 4067 1 4067 1 4067 1

however all it did was drop dragon weapons

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Drop Problem
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Looks easy enough, though I have no idea what dropType does.
After npcdrop =, the first value is the npc id, the second is the drop type. Followed by an array that takes 2 entries: itemID and the amount.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ServerCr4eat3r wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:382034”]Could you post a line or two from that file. The image is way too small to read.[/quote] what //--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 1 1 6529 3 6529 4 6529 5 6529 6 6529 7 6529 8 6529 9 6529 10 6529 11 6529 12 6529 13 6529 14 6529 15
npcdrop = 1 2 1203 1 882 7 877 1 877 2 877 3
